lead_paragraph: TURKEL--Ann Ruth, M.D. The American Academy of Psychoanalysis and Dynamic Psychiatry mourns the loss of our esteemed Past President (2003-2004), who passed November 14, 2015, at the age of 87. She was an extraordinary clinician, steadfast leader, and generous mentor. To her family, our deepest sympathies. David L. Lopez, M.D., President, AAPDP 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TURKEL, ANN RUTH

snippet: TURKEL--Ann Ruth, M.D. The American Academy of Psychoanalysis and Dynamic Psychiatry mourns the loss of our esteemed Past President (2003-2004), who passed November 14, 2015, at the age of 87. She was an extraordinary clinician, steadfast leader, and generous mentor. To her family, our deepest sympathies. David L. Lopez, M.D., President, AAPDP 1/3
